Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class ServerSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ServerSocket
public class ServerSocket extends Object
Class responsible for the communication between this client and the server.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect​(String ip, int port, String playerName, String matchId, String isSinglePlayer)
      Starts the connection with the specified server
      Parameters:
      ip - IP address of the server
      port - Port of the server
      playerName - Name of the player
      isSinglePlayer - whether the match is a single player match or not

      Asks if the player is connected to the server
      Returns:
      true or false

    • heartbeat

      private void heartbeat()
